name: Pitch and Putt Club
description:
The ultimate advancement in golf simulation technology has arrived: with Pitch and Putt Club, your computer's mouse becomes the hole, your environment is the course, and any object of your choosing can act as the ball! Simply select one of ten digital putting greens and tee off, trying to knock the ball into the mouse at the correct moment.

A variety of challenges await to test your timing, finesse, and dexterity. Each putting green allows you to adjust its parameters, enabling you to make the hole exactly as difficult as you and your playing partners want it to be.

Whether you're a seasoned veteran of the fairways, or the most casual duffer this side of the sand trap, Pitch and Putt Club gives you the opportunity to hit the links wherever you go. The greatest golf course on Earth may have been inside of your living room all along!
